product_name: adidas HT 3-In-1 Gore-Tex Jacket - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Stay warm and dry in the HT 3-in-1 Jacket. With a waterproof Gore-Tex performance outer shell and a zip-in insulated liner jacket you'll be prepared for wind, rain and chilly temperatures.
short_description: Stay warm and dry in the HT 3-in-1 Jacket. With a waterproof Gore-Tex performance outer shell and a zip-in insulated liner jacket you'll be prepared for wind, rain and chilly temperatures.
